headline: Mizuho Maintains Neutral Rating on Xylem Inc. (XYL), Raises Its Price Target from $125 to $140
summary: Xylem Inc. (NYSE:XYL) is one of the 20 Best Stocks to Buy and Hold for a Lifetime, delivering consistent revenue and dividend growth. Mizuho maintained a Neutral rating on Xylem Inc. (NYSE:XYL) and increased its price target from $125 to $140 on September 12, 2025, citing the company’s restructuring and efficiency improvements. A week prior, […]

headline: Xylem to Release Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results on October 28, 2025
summary: WASHINGTON, October 01, 2025--Xylem Inc. (NYSE: XYL), a leading global water solutions company that empowers customers and communities to build a more water-secure world, will release its third quarter 2025 results at 6:55 a.m. (ET) on October 28, 2025. At 9:00 a.m. (ET), Xylem’s senior management team will host a conference call with investors.

headline: Xylem (XYL), Amazon Partner To Support Water Sustainability In Mexico
summary: Xylem Inc. (NYSE:XYL) is one of the best smart city stocks. On September 11, Xylem and Amazon announced a collaboration for advanced water management technology in Mexico City and Monterrey to conserve over 1.3 billion liters of water per year. The project will deploy Xylem Vue, a software solution that applies data analytics to spot […]

headline: VLTO Water Grows on Strong Industrial, Municipal Tailwinds
summary: Veralto taps rising industrial and municipal demand, with semiconductor tailwinds and U.S. infrastructure funding boosting its water solutions growth.
